scripts.start-server-with-build: cd server && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.test:all: npm run test-server && cd Cardoon && yarn test --run
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test-server:coverage && cd Cardoon && yarn test --run --coverage
scripts.test:coverage:open: npm run test-server:coverage && cd Cardoon && yarn test --run --coverage && echo 'ğŸ” Opening coverage reports...' && (cd server && npx serve coverage) & (cd Cardoon && npx serve coverage)
